refined_action_summary: Optimize arm alignment in setup and enhance wrist coil in backswing while maintaining strong arm extension at impact

setup.refined_suggestion: Keep the racket arm slightly closer to the body to form a more comfortable right angle in the elbow, which will improve swing path and fluidity

backswing.refined_suggestion: Emphasize a deeper wrist coil during the backswing to generate more elastic power, while keeping the elbow height steady

power.refined_suggestion: Maintain your current arm extension at impact, as it provides solid power and consistency

improvement_drills: Repetition drill focusing on achieving a natural elbow bend in the setup
Repetition drill emphasizing controlled wrist coil in the backswing
next_steps: Record a new video after practice to check for smoother arm positioning and stronger wrist preparation
